name: @projectbasalt/react-async-storage
description: A React global store with automatic async fetching.

scripts.prepare-pack: npm run build && cp package.json ./dist && cp .npmignore ./dist && cp ./src/global.d.ts ./dist
scripts.bundle: npm run prepare-pack && npm pack ./dist && npm run clean
scripts.release: npm run prepare-pack && npm publish ./dist && npm run clean

author: Francesco Natati
